Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Central Park/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st, due to street blockage near Central Park/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st, due to street blockage near Central Park/31st.

Allow extra travel time.
